#  Investor FAQs 

[Show All](#)

What is Triumph Financial?

Triumph Financial, Inc. (Nasdaq: TFIN) is a financial holding company focused on payments, factoring and banking. Headquartered in Dallas, Texas, its diversified portfolio of brands includes TriumphPay, Triumph and TBK Bank.

Where is Triumph Financial’s corporate headquarters?

12700 Park Central Drive, Suite 1700 Dallas, Texas 75251

What is Triumph Financial’s ticker symbol?

NASDAQ Ticker Symbol: TFIN

On which exchange does Triumph Financial trade?

Triumph Financial trades on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the Ticker “TFIN”.

When did Triumph Financial go public?

Triumph Financial went public on November 6, 2014 at an initial offering price of $12.00.

Who were the underwriters of Triumph Financial’s IPO?

The offering was underwritten by Sandler O’Neill & Partners, L.P., Evercore Group L.L.C. and Wells Fargo Securities with Keefe, Bruyette & Woods, Inc. and Nomura Securities International, Inc. acting as co-managers.

Does Triumph Financial, Inc. pay dividends?

Historically, we have not declared or paid any dividends on our common stock. Due to the growth we are experiencing, over the foreseeable future, we intend to retain all earnings, if any, for business use.

Who do I contact with questions about transferring my stock?

Our transfer agent, EQ Shareowner Services can help you in a variety of shareholder-related services including change of address, lost stock certificates, stock transfer, account status and other administrative services. You can contact our transfer agent at: Address: 1110 Centre Pointe Curve, Suite 101 Mendota Heights, MN 55120-4101 Telephone: 800-401-1957 Website: [www.shareowneronline.com](https://www.shareowneronline.com/UserManagement/WFIndex.aspx)

Who is Triumph Financial's auditor?

Crowe Horwath LLP

What is Triumph Financial’s fiscal year?

Our fiscal year ends on December 31.

When is Triumph Financial’s next earnings release?

Our next earnings release can be viewed by visiting the Events and Presentations section of our website.

Who are the members of the Triumph Financial’s Management and Board of Directors?

Our Management and Board of Director bios are available under the Leadership and Board of Directors sections of our website.

What is Triumph Financial’s CUSIP number?

Triumph Financial’s CUSIP is 89679E102.

Does Triumph Financial have a Code of Conduct?

Yes, the policy can be found in the Governance section on our website.

How can I purchase Triumph Financial shares?

Triumph Financial common stock can be purchased in the open market through any registered broker.

How do I get added to Triumph Financial’s email distribution list?

Please go to the E-mail Alerts section of our website.

Where can I find the latest Triumph Financial presentation and earnings call information?

You may find this information on our Events & Presentations section of our website.

How do I get copies of financial documents, such as the annual report, Form 10-K or Form 10-Q?

Triumph Financial’s financial documents can be found on the SEC Filings section of our Investor Relations website and on [www.sec.gov](https://www.sec.gov).

How do I contact Investor Relations?

Contact our Investor Relations department by calling 214-365-6936 or by emailing ir@tfin.com

#  Email Alerts 

To opt-in for investor email alerts, please select at least one alert option and enter your email address in the field below. After submitting your request, an activation email will be sent to the address provided. You must click the activation link in order to complete your subscription. You can sign up for additional alert options at any time. If you would like to opt out of email alerts, you can [unsubscribe here](/unsubscribe). 

Required fields denoted by an asterisk ().

Hide lower priority columns

Alert type  
---  
Quote  
SEC Filing  
Event  
News  
Weekly Summary  
  
Email

Leave this field blank

#  Investor Contact 

Luke Wyse Senior Vice President, Finance and Investor Relations Phone: 214-365-6936 E-mail: ir@triumphllc.com **Transfer Agent** Effective November 13, 2014, Wells Fargo Shareowner Services will serve as Triumph Financial's Transfer Agent and Registrar. Shareholder records will automatically transfer to Wells Fargo Shareowner Services. You may contact Wells Fargo Shareowner Services as provided below: **Online** [www.shareowneronline.com](http://www.shareowneronline.com) **Telephone** 800-468-9716 Toll-Free 651-450-4064 Outside the United States Shareowner Relations Specialists are available Monday through Friday, from 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. Central Time **Written Correspondence** Wells Fargo Shareowner Services P.O. Box 64874 St Paul, MN 55164-0874 **Certified and Overnight Delivery** Wells Fargo Shareowner Services 1110 Centre Pointe Curve, Suite 101 Mendota Heights, MN 55120
